unknownColumn: The request references a non-existent column.
invalidSqlSyntax: Invalid SQL syntax. Please contact the backend team.
sqlParsingFailed: SQL parsing failed due to malformed syntax.
fieldRequiredNotNull: The field '{field}' is required and cannot be null.

db.uniqueConstraintError: This {label} is already taken in {tableName} table
db.uniqueConstraintErrorWithValue: The ${label} '${value}' is already taken in ${tableName} table
db.foreignKeyConstraintError: The provided value for '${field}' does not reference an existing record.
db.foreignKeyDeletionConstraintError: Cannot delete or update '${field}' because it is still referenced by other records.
